SQL.LOAD: SELECT batch_number, vendor_id, vendor_address_id, amount, accounting_period, payment_status_xcd, distributed, posted, paymentsource, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, ap_payment_batch_id FROM elp_ap_payment_batch WHERE ap_payment_batch_id = :ap_payment_batch_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_ap_payment_batch SET batch_number = :batch_number, vendor_id = :vendor_id, vendor_address_id = :vendor_address_id, amount = :amount, accounting_period = :accounting_period, payment_status_xcd = :payment_status_xcd, distributed = :distributed, posted = :posted, paymentsource = :paymentsource, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE ap_payment_batch_id = :ap_payment_batch_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_ap_payment_batch ( batch_number, vendor_id, vendor_address_id, amount, accounting_period, payment_status_xcd, distributed, posted, paymentsource, created_by, ap_payment_batch_id ) VALUES ( :batch_number, :vendor_id, :vendor_address_id, :amount, :accounting_period, :payment_status_xcd, :distributed, :posted, :paymentsource, :created_by, :ap_payment_batch_id )
